mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT CD_ITEM AS itemCode ,DT_IO AS dtSo ,'BATCH' AS deliveryType ,NO_PSO_MGMT AS noSo ,NO_PSOLINE_MGMT AS seqSo ,QT_IO AS qtDelivery FROM NEOE.NEOE.MM_QTIO WHERE 1=1 AND CD_SL = 'DOK' AND DT_IO = #{regDate} AND CD_PARTNER = '00546' AND FG_IO = 010
UNION ALL
SELECT A.CD_ITEM AS itemCode , A.DT_IO AS dtSo , '012' AS deliveryType , A.NO_IO AS noSo , A.NO_IOLINE AS seqSo , A.QT_IO AS qtDelivery FROM NEOE.MM_QTIO A INNER JOIN ( SELECT NO_IO FROM NEOE.MM_QTIOH WHERE 1=1 AND CD_COMPANY = '1000' and CD_PLANT = '1000' AND CD_PARTNER = '00546' AND DT_IO = #{regDate} AND CD_DEPT_REQ = '22200' ) B ON A.NO_IO = B.NO_IO ) AA ORDER BY AA.noSo, AA.seqSo
